definitions: Estimate or forecast something on the basis of present trends or data.
Extend outward beyond something else; protrude.
Display or broadcast an image or movie onto a surface.
Present or promote (a particular image or impression).
examples: They project a 5% increase in sales.
The balcony projects over the street.
The film was projected onto the screen.
He projected the ball across the field.
She projects an air of confidence.
